original_text: Then Jesus said, ‘What I tell you is true. Some people who are standing here will see clearly God begin to rule in his kingdom. They will see that before they die.’
korean_text: 내가 참으로 너희에게 이르노니 여기 서 있는 사람 중에 죽기 전에 하나님의 나라를 볼 자들도 있느니라

sentences.original_text: What I tell you is true
Some people who are standing here
will see clearly God begin to rule
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 통치하기 시작하시는 것을 분명히 볼 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will see that before they die
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 죽기 전에 그것을 볼 것이다
